short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-generate super cool replies on Twitter and LinkedIn using AI. Access replyboy.com for more info.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It was hard to come up with cool tweets or interesting posts, right? Not anymore...

Reply Boy will 1000𝕏 Your Twitter & LinkedIn Views.

Generate images directly from X website. Just type the prompt and click Create Image.

This is how Reply Boy works:

1) Options you can choose from the extension popup (top right icon on your Chrome)
❓ Do Questions
❗️ Or Affirmations
💬 Keep text Humanized
😃 Use or Not Emojis
#️⃣ Add or Remove Hashtags

2) Choose a message mood
😍 Romantic
😃 Funny
🤓 Clever
😎 Ironic
🤯 Philosophical
🫣 Controversial
🤬 Hater
💬 Standard
👏 Applause
🤓 Educational

3) Works for
• New posts: type a subject in the compose window (eg: talk about OpenAI) and click the mood
• Replies: just click the ReplyBoy icon in the comments section and choose a mood

4) Generating Photos
- It will be generated directly from Twitter's dashboard, using Flux model from FengMyShui.com
- Just type a prompt in a compose or reply field and click Create AI Image 🖼️
- Example of prompt: "photo of a woman on the beach holding a sign saying We Love ReplyBoy"
- In a few seconds, image will be ready on your clipboard to be pasted (CMD+V Mac, Ctrl+V Windows)
- Generating AI Image works only on Twitter 𝕏 as LinkedIn doesn't have paste feature yet.

5) Reply Boy is secure and privacy-first
- We don't track your data
- We don't log your messages
- We don't brake social media rules
- We don't need any passwords or login

The best way to get more social media impressions and followers is by replying to popular tweets and posts. Reply Boy makes it super easy.

Reply Boy can also be used to post new content, just write any topic, like: "write a joke about AI images" and click the Mood button. A brand new Tweet or LinkedIn post will be generated in seconds.

Have we mentioned how amazing is to generate images using Flux model? Super realistic.

All you have to do is type a prompt (on a reply or a new post), such as: "photo of batman playing soccer" and hit "Create Image".

It'll be ready on your clipboard to be pasted on Twitter (CMD+V for Mac or Ctrl+V for Windows).

You can also activate options like: use emojis, use hashtags, make humanized talk (with slangs, abbreviations, etc) and much more coming on new updates.

Try it out for free. No setup needed.

Did you like our extension? Please leave a review, it helps us a lot.

Thank you and enjoy.

* Feedback is always welcome on DM https://x.com/duborges or Email support@replyboy.com
